abstract: Boeing’s announcement that it had started presenting airlines with an enhanced version of its 777 jet, rather than a whole new plane, underscores the shift.
snippet: Boeing’s announcement that it had started presenting airlines with an enhanced version of its 777 jet, rather than a whole new plane, underscores the shift.
lead_paragraph: After a decade of pushing hard on the edge of technology, Boeing and Airbus are turning more cautious in building new jetliners.

headline.main: Jet Makers Avoid Risk by Redoing Old Models
headline.print_headline: Jet Makers Avoid Risk By Redoing Old Models
